scripts.build:ui: rmdir /s /q build && cd C:\Users\lauri\Full-Stack-Open-Noteapp-Frontend\noteappFrontend && npm run build --prod && xcopy /s /e build C:\Users\lauri\Full-Stack-Open-Noteapp-Backend\notebackend\build
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
